keyMoments.title: CP9 Agents Battle Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Multiple CP9 agents including Fukurou and Kumadori engage the Straw Hat Pirates in combat throughout the Tower of Justice.
keyMoments.significance: The climactic battles between CP9 and the Straw Hats continue as the pirates fight to rescue Robin.

reveals.information: CP9 agents demonstrate advanced Rokushiki techniques including Fukurou's Jugon and Fukuro Dataki
